alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 4:01PM EDT until April 28 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central Ohio... Southeastern Licking County in central Ohio... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Heath, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Millersport, Fairfield Beach, Harbor Hills, Marne, Thornport, Thurston, Gratiot, Brownsville and Interstate 70 at State Route 13. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 127 and 142, and near mile marker 144. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
